name: squall
content:
squall noun [C]
(STRONG WIND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sudden strong wind or short storm: Violent squalls signalled the approach of the hurricane.

squall noun [C]
(SHOUT)
a loud, sharp noise

Add to word list
a sudden, strong wind or brief storm, esp. over water: Occasional rain squalls blow furiously across the sea.
